data.name: Dragon Sleuth Brittany
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’˜CHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’˜

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1962890


About the Game

A lewd scalie pixel-art comedy sex adventure.
Explore Dragon Island with Brittany Sweetbottom, an administrative assistant that dreams of becoming a full-fledged sleuth! Bathe yourself in the magically casual and overtly sexual dragon culture while you help Brittany collect clues and unravel the mystery of the missing dragon eggs. Filled to the brim with sex scenes, over-the-top sex jokes and a mix of jazz, electro beats and chiptunes.

Get in and out fast!
Dragon Sleuth Brittany will launch immediately into strong lewd scenes and won't stop until the end. No long-winded expositions take place, all the dialogue is focused on telling the story effectively so that you can blow off some steam after work with Brittany! Watch previously viewed scenes at any time from the gallery on the main menu.

Fully animated
Every scene has been meticulously animated to pixel perfection. A 2D lighting system is implemented to accentuate the artwork and provide immersion.



A game with an RPG feel without the turn-based combat.
We crafted unique and hilariously lewd mini-games instead!
  • Collect milk as a miniaturized Brittany from Noelleâ€™s breasts
  • Fight other dragons in the wrestling arena
  • Play beach ball

High resolution sex scenes.
You control the action! Watch any scene for as long as you like, each one offers different controls such as: speed, camera angle and cum button.

Full English voice acting
Features a star-studded cast of sexy adult voice actors:
  • Requiem
  • Lady Lustria
  • Leo Greystone
  • Miss Moonified
  • Pixie Willow

Multiple Input Choices
Designed for touch, mouse and gamepad inputs in mind. Your favorite control type is supported.

data.short_description: Dragon Sleuth Brittany showcases high quality pixel art combined with a cool soundtrack, voiced dialogue and filled to the brim with lewd jokes, sex scenes and lewd mini games.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5 3rd Generator or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11. Most cards manufactured after 2012 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7 4th Generation or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 650 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. All characters depicted are 18 years of age and above!

Themes in this game include:

Game is targeted to the "furry" demographic.
Full nudity (female, male or hermaphroditic)
Straight, gay and bisexual animated sexual content (optional, only experience what you choose.)
Fantasy sexual situations with exaggerated characters.
Various non-vanilla kinks (BDSM, exotic 'monster-people' races.)
